name: Nightmare (itch) (willow3w)
description:
Game Story.

You wake up and find that your home seems different. You gradually realise that you are trapped in your own nightmare.

But be careful, the dream world is full of crises.

Gameplay.

Players need to use "A,W,S,D" to control Player's movement, and use the left mouse button to interact with objects in the room to trigger different endings, the game has a variety of endings to look forward to your exploration.
